As noted by many the first 2 minutes is barely audible. I think @manOtor hit it on the head about the audio cord being in the wrong slot. The audio went out of sync about two thirds the way through the movie and kept jumping pretty much through till the end. Also, there were a few instances where the movie skipped briefly forwards and back, only by a second or so so it was more like a stutter. For the most part the picture was dvd quality. 

Overall and until a DvdRip/BluRayRip comes out this is the best going around. 

Cheers
